thread.title: Steve Miller Announces Summer Tour With Peter Frampton
thread.title_full: Steve Miller Announces Summer Tour With Peter Frampton

author: Colin Stutz ,
title: Steve Miller Announces Summer Tour With Peter Frampton
text:
By Colin Stutz | January 31, 2017 9:30 PM EST 
Inductee Steve Miller performs onstage at the 31st Annual Rock And Roll Hall Of Fame Induction Ceremony at Barclays Center of Brooklyn on April 8, 2016 in New York City. Kevin Kane/WireImage for Rock and Roll Hall of Fame 0 0 0 
Steve Miller has announced a summer tour with Peter Frampton that will span June to August with more than 30 shows. 
The tour kicks off June 15 at the PNC Bank Arts Center in Holmdel, New Jersey, and wraps Aug. 13 at the Ironstone Amphitheatre in Murphys, California. See the full dates below. 
Miller and Frampton have history together, spanning back since the beginning of their careers. 
Read more: 'Nice Guy' Steve Miller Talks Rock Hall Rancor, Who He Wishes Had Inducted Him and How He'd Fix the Whole 'Rude' Process 
"Peter and I first met at Olympic studios in London in the late sixties when we were both just starting our recording careers," said Miller in a statement. "He was a wonderful guitarist and songwriter then and he is even more so today. Over the years, we've played together in venues from theaters to football stadiums and everything in between. He always sets the musical bar high, his band always knocks me out and I'm thrilled we are going to spend the summer together doing a great run of concerts. This is the kind of quality and talent we both strive to present and I'm looking forward to a summer of great music, exceptional performances and fun. Peter is remarkable musician." 
Steve Miller 2017 Summer Tour Dates: 
06/15 - Holmdel, NJ @ PNC Bank Arts Center06/17 - Wantagh, NY @ Nikon at Jones Beach Theater06/18 - Hunter, NY @ Mountain Jam Festival06/20 - Toronto, ONT @ Budweiiser Stage06/21 - Canadaigua, NY @ Constellation Brands Marvin PAC06/23 - Columbia, MD @ Merriweather Post Pavilion06/24 - Mashantucket, CT @ The Grand Theater At Foxwoods Casino06/25 - Gilford, NH @ Bank of New Hampshire Pavilion06/27 - Philadelphia, PA @ Mann Center PAC06/30 - Verona, NY @ Turning Stone Resort and Casino07/01 - Sterling Heights, MI @ Michigan Lottery Theater at Freedom Hill07/14 - Hollywood, FL @ Seminole Hard Rock Live07/15 - Estero, FL @ Germain Arena07/16 - Alpharetta , GA @ Verizon Wireless Amp07/18 - Rogers, AR @ Walmart Amp07/19 - Kansas City, MO @ Starlight Theatre07/20 - Aurora, IL @ River Edge Park07/22 - Walker, MN @ Moondance Jam07/23 - Welch, MN @ Treasure Island Resort & Casino07/25 - Park City, KS @ Hartman Arena07/28 - Tulsa, OK @ River Spirit Casino07/29 - Thackerville, OK @ WinStar World Casino07/31 - Morrison, CO @ Red Rocks08/02 - Salt Lake City, UT @ USANA Amp08/04 - Bend, OR @ Les Schwab Amp08/05 - Auburn, WA @ White River Amp08/06 - Troutdale, OR @ McMenamins Edgefield08/08 - Las Vegas, NV @ The Colosseum at Caesars Palace08/09 - Costa Mesa, CA @ Pacific Amp08/11 - Los Angeles, CA @ Greek Theatre08/12 - Mountain View, CA @ Shoreline Amp08/13 - Murphys, CA @ Ironstone Amp
